verses.name: Mark 10:39
verses.text: And they said unto him, We can. And Jesus said unto them, Ye shall indeed drink of the cup that I drink of; and with the baptism that I am baptized withal shall ye be baptized:

verses.name: Mark 10:40
verses.text: But to sit on my right hand and on my left hand is not mine to give; but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared.

verses.name: Mark 10:41
verses.text: And when the ten heard it, they began to be much displeased with James and John.
